name: ProjectPLEDGE
description: One-time utility bill assistance for past-due amounts up to $750
fullDescription: ProjectPLEDGE provides one-time utility bill assistance for Palo Alto residents facing financial hardship, helping cover past-due utility balances.
whatTheyOffer:
- One-time utility bill assistance
- Up to $750 in assistance
- Covers past-due amounts
- Credit cannot exceed outstanding balance
- Helps prevent service disconnection
- Funded through community donations
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto Utilities customer
2. Must be the customer-of-record on account
3. Must have past-due utility balance
4. Demonstrate financial hardship
5. Complete application process
6. Credit applied to account if approved
